bid_fee.description: Fee applied to executed bids Sent to Overseer interest buffer

liquidation_threshold.description: Liquidation threshold amount in stable denom. When the current collaterals value is smaller than the threshold, all collaterals will be liquidated

liquidator_fee.description: Fee applied to executed bids Sent to the address executing the liquidation

safe_ratio.description: borrow_amount / borrow_limit must always be bigger than safe_ratio.

waiting_period.description: Time period that needs to pass for a bid to be activated (seconds)

Decimal256.description: A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal256(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0 The greatest possible value that can be represented is 115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039457.584007913129639935 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
